attributes.action: Routinely test emergency services staff members for COVID-19.
attributes.additional_details: The emergency servicesare the hero's of our country, we must keep them fighting the virus for the public and we must protect them. If every emergency service worker self isolated every time they fell ill the service would collapse as it was outstretched before COVID-19. The government needs to make a plan to test their workforce.
attributes.background: The government needs to have a policy were they routinely test emergency services staff members for COVID-19. They are unable to self isolate because if they did there wouldn't be a workforce left.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The conduct of tests is a clinical decision for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

We have published a petition calling for the Government to provide publicly accessible testing for coronavirus around the UK, which you might want to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:  

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
